replies.body: I love that Riot does these things - some games actually sue people for copyright infringement if they cosplay. *facepalm*
Who in their right mind would do that? Cosplay is like free advertising.
Hey there is this company called Nintendo maybe you've heard of it, they do some pretty crazy stuff sometimes!
That was Square Enix not Nintedo dude.
Hit em with the porosnax {{item:2054}}
Hit em with the fax

I just wanted to comment on the lawsuit by Square Enix to Phantom Productions (which I believe is in question here). First, Square Enix did nothing wrong when suing these "cosplayers". Second, it wasn't fan-art, they actually profited from the "cosplaying video" and they also used unauthorized live-action scenes of the FFVII franchise. You cannot profit from something you didn't create, which in this case is the character(s) (and no, as bad as it sounds not even when you make the costume from scratch). You cannot sell something that doesn't belong to you neither can you profit from it. When I saw the comment I read the article pertaining the suit and so I wanted to share my thoughts. Posting the actual article in case someone wants to read it :)

http://www.destructoid.com/square-enix-sues-ffvii-advent-children-cosplayers-for-325k-142888.phtml
True that!
notice how the names of the champions are not listed.   Sadly riot probably would if they could.....
Nice cosplay...but there is no way these girls even play the game.  should be players only cosplay.
Excuse you, there is A huge amount of girls that play LoL. It is very likely some of these girls play. Cosplayers cosplay what theyre passionate about. Stop being sexist.
Don't give him a hard time. It's tough enough for him, being as stupid as he is.
sexist =/= stupid, just misinformed. Generally a result of the behavior of the male leader figures in someone's life. It can be corrected however. Anyone can unlearn sexism.

I did not say sexist equals stupid. I said that he was stupid. The sexist bit was an implied 2 for 1 special. Perhaps you need to install some humor programs, algorithms, and whatever else your model uses.
revliledpembroke  that was fking hilarious but it seems that those programs arent standard with his model
Sexism is hard to control. This is the internet, after all. And we all know the internet is filled with /r/etards and chauvinistic pigs.

And people that continue to use "/r/etard" as a derogatory term. Please, if you plan on insulting people don't use something that hits home with some people. Use that thing in your skull to come up with a greater insult, and leave them pondering what you said.
Why harp on him about his use of that word and not mention to the poster above who used "stupid" to describe the OP. Stupid people have feelings, too.
Yes, but it's okay to make fun of people who are sexist/racist for being stupid. See any joke made about stupid people from the American South.

not defending the guy but you might want to know what your calling someone before you say they are being something they are not..  he never said "there is no way "girls" play the game" he said "these girls" as in the ones in the photos. from the sounds of his post im sure he was commenting based on their looks, not the fact that they are women. 
and not all cosplayers are dressing up because they are passionate about it.. take my girlfriend for instance. if she dressed up as a league champion it wouldn't be because she likes the game (she's never played) its because she would be doing it for me. sounds like someone is just way to easily offended and takes things in the wrong way before fully understanding the situation.. 

-edit- just saw "mogwailux" did post again saying exactly what i said. he wasnt being sexist lol. people assume things w/o full understanding and want to jump to their own conclusions...
Like people assuming others don't play the game based on their appearance?

Man...talk about a lot of anger going on here...but I suppose this is League of Legends and being toxic is kinda its thing.  I never said "WOMEN do not play LOL."  I said "THESE WOMEN so not play LOL"  As in the particular females in these photos.  Which is in not even a remote way a sexist comment.  I'm well aware that millions and millions of women play video games.  So calm down people.  Eat some prozac or something.  Of course you could notice the fact that every single female in these photos are attractive as hell and it is more unlikely that they game.  I know I'm blowing a lot of gamer fantasies here but your average gamer girl isn't a model on the side.  Also, out of all the photos chosen, your telling me that only attractive women were capable of making a outstanding costume? I doubt it.  Id bet a lot of money that some other women had better costumes out there but didn't make the cut because whoever voted on these voted with their little heads rather than the large one.  But hey, I'm sure there are a shit ton of gorgeous girls who play this game (BS) and they all know how to make amazing cosplay costumes (BS).  Well I'm a gonna go back to reality and you guys can stay in your angry land of delusion.

I make prop. I play League.

Unless you're calling me ugly. :(
Idk...post a link to some nude pics of yourself and I'll get back to ya about it.
You realize they're in the post... right?
That jarvan cosplay is truly {{champion:44}}  OUTRAGEOUS.{{champion:44}}
Xin givin me the bedroom eyes
RIGHT?? I was like "I had no idea Xin looked looked like that!!" *swoooon*
Please someone PLEASE tell me these aren't the final winners!!! Are these all the entries? Because I don't see my friends.

Hey breit10! You can see more of the entries on Boards. =)
http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/cosplay-en/V6xBHzW3-happy-new-year-the-lunar-revel-cosplay-roundup-is-here
Thank you!!!
FIRST

Only if the deck is stacked in my favor. {{champion:4}}
{{champion:56}} In your dreams!

Thank you everyone for sharing your awesome creations!

I love all the Rivens.  Kiily's my personal favorite but everyone looks amazing. :)
That {{champion:69}} was awesome, the others were great don't get me wrong, but imagine the effort put into making that and then getting it out there, just to take a picture.
Oh that Cassiopeia! Like holy hell that is amazing! On point!
That {{champion:55}}  tho :)
Casual Katarina. I bet that isnt even a real scar.
why no {{champion:412}}
The costumes are amazing.
The Ruvvet Katrina cosplay was the best. The photographer was the best photographer.
That wukong is so cool!
{{champion:429}} looks like she about to kamehameha someone
i love that lee sin cosplay!!!!!!!{{champion:64}}
I want that Jarvan... and that Trynd... like... someone wrap them up and give them to me. As a present...
